entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low plus 5.

entry.title: Monday: A few showers. High 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with a few showers. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near noon. High 8. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 7 May 2023
